content: @Rishi Gupta , I was working on issue #8679 (adding reaction popover), I need your suggestions on the design of popover (its very raw at the moment), but I've fixed all events associated to it. Screenshot-73.png
great! As a first pass I would just copy the styling of the html title popover?
Do you want it to look like html one?
that would be good for getting the work merged, and then we can separately iterate on the styling?
Can be done. So I'll update here when I'm done with that part (although I think it might be not possible to completely mimic the html title styling, but I might be wrong) :)
@Rishi Gupta Have a look at this - 10.JPG ?
hm, could you take a screenshot of what the html title styling looks like in your browser?

IMG_20180331_224729034.jpg
Sorry for delay, actually I had to click a photo (screenshot was not possible). :)

Thanks! A few small things:

  • the spacing around the text (to the right and left), is too little
  • let's just remove the box shadow, or at least make it less extreme, since we don't use it much in zulip
  • let's make the border radius 3px?
  • make sure this also works in dark mode

The other big thing is that I tihnk it makes sense to have this appear to the right of the cursor, rather than centered, just given where the emoji are relative to the rest of the screen.

Thanks @Rishi Gupta for the suggestions , I will do those improvements.
Also, regarding the last point, do you mean to say this - have popover to the right rather than at the bottom of reaction button?
bottom is fine, I just mean to the right of the cursor (same as the title text)

@Rishi Gupta , done with those improvements, see if anything else is required :)
Screenshot-78.png Screenshot-77.png (cursor is just left to the starting of popovers)
this looks great! I would remove the box shadow, but other than that feel free to open a PR :).
